name: Saola Baikal Shoes - Men's
description:
Hybrid shoes for work, travel, weekend strolls – so pretty much everything. They have rubber panels on the high-contact points of the soles help with durability. Plus, each pair of shoes contains 3–4 plastic bottles.Uppers are made of synthetic leather (polyurethane) and recycled PET sourced from plastic bottles.Removable cork insole with recycled polyurethane foam cushioning adapts to your foot.Cushioned ankle support.Outsoles are recycled EVA with rubber panels at high contact points.Runs slightly small, size up a half to a full size.

        Sustainability
